text.sentence: If you have a complete list regarding the Enserch entities we wish to trade with, I can run it by Enserch and check on the legal names.

I think it would be helpful for our full distribution (Legal, Confirm and Others (settlements, Global Contracts, misc), if you would distribute a full list of the Enserch entities we wish to continue trading with and what business out of each entity.
I think this will stop people coming back and asking again and again.
